title: Investigate the Murders
content:
Investigate the Murders Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Lower City Reward Amulet of Bhaal

Investigate the Murders

Investigate the Murders is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Investigate the Murders can be acquired during Act 3 and is part of the overall quest to Get Orin's Netherstone. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.
